Set-SECRET.WAR GAB I HE T 242b .MINUTES OF A MEETING- of the War Cabinet held at 10 downing street, S.W., on MONDAY, October 1, 1917, at 1 p.m.Present:THE PRIME MINISTER (in the Chair)The Rt. Hon. the Earl Curzon J The Rt. Hon. G.N.Barnes, M.P.,of Kedleston, K.G. , CCS.I., jG.C.I.E., j Lieut.-General the Rt. Hon. -J.C.j Smuts, K.C,The Rt. Hon. the ViscountMilner, G C B ., G.G.M.G., j- ' * . IThe Rt. Hon. A. Bonar Law, M.P.,55The following were also present:-The Rt. Hon. A.J.Balfour, O.M., M.P.,Secretary of State for ForeignAffairs.Lieutenant-Colonel Sir M.P.A.Hankey, K.C.B.,Secretary, War Cabinet.
